revision.text:
<!--철학자_정보-->
{{TemplateMapping
| mapToClass = Philosopher
| mappings =
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 이름 | ontologyProperty = foaf:name }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 출생일 | ontologyProperty = birthDate }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 출생일 | ontologyProperty = birthYear }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 출생지 | ontologyProperty = birthPlace }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 사망일 | ontologyProperty = deathDate }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 사망일 | ontologyProperty = deathYear }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 사망지 | ontologyProperty = deathPlace }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 지역 | ontologyProperty = region }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 시대 | ontologyProperty = era }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 학파 | ontologyProperty = philosophicalSchool }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 연구분야 | ontologyProperty = mainInterest }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 주요업적  | ontologyProperty = notableIdea }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 영향받음 | ontologyProperty = influencedBy }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 영향줌 | ontologyProperty = influenced }}
end}}
